title: Wolf Tooth GeoShift 2° Angle Headset adjusts head tube angles to the next degree
content:
Got a bike that you love, but wish that head tube angle was a little different? Whether steeper or slacker, sometimes it’s good to have options. And now, with the latest headset option from Wolf Tooth Components, you can choose an even more aggressive angle if that’s your thing. Taking the next logical step from

The post Wolf Tooth GeoShift 2° Angle Headset adjusts head tube angles to the next degree appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
